member.name: CERT_KEYGEN_REQUEST_INFO
member.summary: The CERT_KEYGEN_REQUEST_INFO structure contains information stored in the Netscape key generation request. The subject and subject public key BLOBs are encoded.

member.name: CERT_KEYGEN_REQUEST_INFO.dwVersion
member.summary: The version number of the certificate. CERT_KEYGEN_REQUEST_V1 (0) is the only defined version number.

member.name: CERT_KEYGEN_REQUEST_INFO.SubjectPublicKeyInfo
member.summary: A structure that contains the encoded public key and public key algorithm.

member.name: CERT_KEYGEN_REQUEST_INFO.pwszChallengeString
member.summary: A random printable string. This string is used by the server to ensure that the key that it is certifying matches the client on the page.
